channel.description: Recent content in Wk1 on HIST1900A

item.title: Setting up the Hypothesis Collaborative Reading Environment
item.description: While watching this video, turn on the closed captions. Create an account at hypothes.is: Get the Chrome app or the Firefox bookmarklet: Make sure you’re logged in: Then join our HIST1900a reading group. If you happen to be reading something, and see an existing annotation that interests you, hit the ‘reply’ button on the annotation to start a conversation! Be respectful! There is a student guide to Hypothes.is behind this link.
